Posts.Title: Small City, Same Problems-need recommendations negirl mpwife98

Posts.Content: Apr 30, 2010 11:26PM negirl wrote: I would highly suggest finding a breast specialist and getting a second opinion.  We often know our bodies better than the doctors.  Also, the breast specialist I used to see was very partial to doing ultrasounds. Personally after having both a mammogram and ultrasound done, I'd prefer the ultrasound.  I was actually able to view the screen while my dr. was scanning. I'm surprised the doctor didn't do more examining based on your mothers history. I would push it if I were you. I think it would be best for your own peace of mind. Wishing you all the best. Jen
Posts.Title: My Mammogram showed nothing but im still worried Nikkietara mad411
